DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator relating to removal of a part, pathway, or function by surgery, chemical destruction, electrocautery, or radiofrequency of liver lesion.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to removal of a part, pathway, or function by surgery, chemical destruction, electrocautery, or radiofrequency of liver lesion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Refers to the liver.:(LEE-zhun) An area of abnormal tissue change.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to, affecting, or associated with the liver.
A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.

Property.preferredDefinition: Removal of a part, pathway, or function by surgery, chemical destruction, electrocautery, or radiofrequency. (Taber's):An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: Removal, separation, detachment, extirpation, or eradication of a body part, pathway, or function by surgery, chemical destruction, morbid process, or noxious substance.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: NSABP CRF:National Surgical Adjuvant Breast and Bowel Project Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
